ForienUnidentifiedItems.Dialog.MystifyAs: Drag & Drop an Item here to set it as new look for {name}
ForienUnidentifiedItems.Settings.allowNe: Check this option to be able to Mystify a Mystified Item, allowing for nested/tiered items that can be identified one at a time.
ForienUnidentifiedItems.Settings.default: Select which icons should be used as defaults for specific Item types.
ForienUnidentifiedItems.Settings.itemPro: Select which Item properties should be by default carried over to mystified item.
ForienUnidentifiedItems.Settings.keepOld: Check this setting to keep original item icon when mystifying. Advanced Mystify still allows manually selecting original vs default icons.
ForienUnidentifiedItems.Notifications.de: Forien's Unidentified Items | Default Item Type Icons has been randomly assigned. Please visit Module Settings for more information.
Forien's Unidentified Items | Default Persisting Item Properties have been generated. Please visit Module Settings for more information.
